option.name: originalContent
option.value: services: - type: web name: loan-repayment-app env: python buildCommand: pip install -r requirements.txt startCommand: uvicorn main:app --host 0.0.0.0 --port 10000 plan: free

option.name: updatedContent
option.value: services: - type: web name: loan-repayment-app env: python buildCommand: pip install -r requirements.txt startCommand: uvicorn main:app --host 0.0.0.0 --port $PORT plan: free
